name: intermolecularly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that involves different molecules (= the simplest units of a chemical substance): These proteins act intermolecularly. Hydrogen bonds can occur intermolecularly or within different parts of a single molecule. Related word
intermolecular
More examplesFewer examplesThe alcohol and acid form an ester that reacts inter-molecularly in the presence of water.The alkenes react intermolecularly at this concentration.The protein forms an intermolecularly folded bundle.The protein chains use intermolecularly interacting 'sticky' patches.These interactions may have a role in stabilizing the crystals in which they occur intermolecularly.
